name: Working From Home
description:
You are a super secret muffin rater.

There is one problem though. You are working from home, know one knows about your occupation and your are ashamed about it.
You can't let anyone find out! However, your family members will go into your room now and then. The game is a cross berween a clickeer game and a stealth game.

Prepare to rate your muffins and don't get caught!

Mo Alam - Programming

Dave Allen - Amazing sound programmer/designer
